nodes.name: getStakersStake

devdoc.details: Continuous liquidity pools to allow on-chain conversions of tokens and ether into and out of CAN. The continuous liquidity pools are permissionless; anyone can add or remove liquidity and anyone can use the pools to convert between assets Satisfies requirements outlined in WhitePaper, with a number of technical compromises - https://github.com/canyaio/canswap-contracts/blob/master/resources/Whitepaper.pdf

activatePool(address).details: Activate the pool. Executed by contract owner

addStakeInPool(address,uint256,uint256).details: Add an additional stake to a pool you stake in. Requires transfer approval

params._amountCan: Address of CanYaCoins to add to stake
params._amountTkn: Amount of tokens to add to stake

addStakeInPool(address,uint256,uint256).return: bool success - Success of function execution

allocateFees(address).details: Allocates fees accumulated in a pool to the stakers based on their pool share

caculateSwapEmission(address,address,uin.details: Calculate token emission from Swap function

params._to: Token the user will receive as output
params._value: Amount of _from token used as deposit

caculateSwapEmission(address,address,uin.return: uint256 tokensEmitted - Value of tokens the swapper will receiveuint256 feeSingleSwap - Liq fee collected in the first swapuint256 feeDoubleSwap - Liq fee collected in the second step of the double swap

createPoolForToken(address,string,string.details: Create a liquidity pool paired with CAN and perform initial stake. Requires transfer approval

params._api: API to associate with the token pool
params._token: Token from which to create pool
params._uri: URI to associate with the token pool

deactivatePool(address).details: De-activate the pool. Executed by contract owner

getAllocationReward(address).details: Calculate the reward msg.sender can expect from re allocating the fees
getAllocationReward(address).return: uint256 rewardTKN - How much of the accumulated TKN fees the staker will getuint256 rewardCAN - How much of the accumulated CAN fees the staker will get

getPoolBalance(address).details: Get pool balance for use on client
getPoolBalance(address).return: uint256 balTKN - Balance on TKN side of pooluint256 balCAN - Balance on CAN side of pooluint256 feeTKN - Unallocated fees on TKN side uint256 feeCAN - Unallocated fees on CAN side

getPoolBalanceById(uint16).details: Get pool balance for use on client

getPoolMeta(address).details: Get pool details for use on client
getPoolMeta(address).return: string uri - Pool URIstring api - Pool APIbool active - Is pool currently active? uint8 minimum stake percentage

getPoolMetaById(uint16).details: Get pool details for use on client

getStakersPools(address).details: Get a list of pools the staker is associated with

getStakersStake(address,address).details: Get stakers stake in a particular pool
getStakersStake(address,address).return: uint256 Stake in TKN side of pooluint256 Stake in CAN side of pooluint256 Rewards allocated in TKN side of pooluint256 Rewards allocated in CAN side of pool

params._canToken: Address of the base token to be used across all pools

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

stakeInPool(address,uint256,uint256).details: Perform stake in pool. Requires transfer approval. New or returning stakers must run allocate fees

swap(address,address,uint256).details: Perform swap and return funds to sender

params._to: Token the user will receive as output
params._value: Amount of _from token used as deposit

swapAndSend(address,address,uint256,addr.details: Perform swap and return funds to recipient

params._recipient: Address that the output funds will be sent to
params._to: Token the user will receive as output
params._value: Amount of _from token used as deposit

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._threshold: Percent of prospective pool that must be staked in order to gain access

updatePoolDetails(address,string,string).details: Update meta properties for a pool

params._api: Updated API to associate with the token pool
params._uri: Updated URI to associate with the token pool

withdrawFees(address).details: Withdraws an active stakers accumulated fees for a particular pool

withdrawFromPool(address).details: Withdraw my stake and fees from the pool

devdoc.title: CanSwap liqudity pools

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
